synthesis_method: The electrolyte synthesis process involved weighing Li2S, P2S5, LiI, and LiBr to achieve a specific composition, mixing them in an agate mortar, then subjecting the mixture to two rounds of mechanical milling in a planetary ball mill with dehydrated heptane, followed by drying to obtain a coarse material, further pulverizing it into minute particles, and conducting additional mechanical milling with a different solvent mix to produce an amorphous sulfide solid electrolyte material.
